title: the Policing, Security and Community Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety 
Act 2024 (oifig an Scrúdaitheora Neamhspleách um Reachtaíocht Slándála) 
(Establishment Day) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited policing security community safety act 2024 (oifig scrudaitheora neamhspleach um reachtaiocht slandala) (establishment day) order 2025

title: the Policing, Security and Community Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024), hereby
heading: 2. The 2nd day of April 2025 is appointed to be the establishment day of
text_raw:
2. The 2nd day of April 2025 is appointed to be the establishment day of 
oifig an Scrúdaitheora Neamhspleách um Reachtaíocht Slándála for the purposes 
of Part 7 of the Policing, Security and Community Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 
2024). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal 
of the Government, 
25 March, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [110] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
